overview: “An Zéro” is a transmedia project structured around a docu-fiction which has the ambition of exploring and documenting, in a plausible manner, the scope of the consequences a major nuclear accident would have on Luxembourg, it’s neighboring countries (Grande-Région) and Europe.
tagline: A major nuclear accident. The question is not whether this will happen. But when it will happen.
title: An Zéro
